subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira drove in four runs with two home runs yesterday and John Smoltz became the Braves’ strikeout leader as Atlanta beat the Arizona Diamondbacks, 6-2, at home.
snippet: Mark Teixeira drove in four runs with two home runs yesterday and John Smoltz became the Braves’ strikeout leader as Atlanta beat the Arizona Diamondbacks, 6-2, at home.
